param.name: timespan
param.doc: The time span of records to return, given in the form 'n%', where 'n' is the duration and '%' is the units. Valid units are 'm', 'h' or 'd' for minutes, hours or days respectively. The duration of the records returned is from the current system time minus the given time span to the current system time. (For example, one day '1d' returns statistics for the previous day, two hours '2h' returns statistics for the previous two hours)

method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve the Storage Statistics using the web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: label
param.doc: The localized label for the chart. (For example, "System Storage Stats")

param.name: dateMinMaxDiff
param.doc: The difference in time between the first and last returned records. (In seconds)

param.name: root
param.doc: Details about the active root partition.

param.name: ymax
param.doc: The value of the highest possible record. (Always 100, indicating a maximum value of 100%)

param.name: x
param.doc: The time, represented as a UNIX time stamp.

param.name: y
param.doc: The space consumed on the partition (as a percentage) recorded during the time given in x until the next record.

param.name: set
param.doc: The partition the usage was recorded for. Either "root" or "boot".

param.name: id
param.doc: Unique identifier, the set and time values separated by a '_' character.

param.name: size
param.doc: The size of the partition. (In megabytes)

param.name: used
param.doc: The amount of space consumed on the partition. (In megabytes)

param.name: avail
param.doc: The amount of space available on the partition. (In megabytes)
